Demian Neidetcher | Home

I'm a software engineer. Almost all of my programming experience has been with JVM languages like Java, Groovy and more recently Scala. Most of my career I have been in the telecommunications business. Work is in Denver, Colorado but I'm a remote worker in Lafayette, Louisiana.

I currently work on a great team at Time Warner Cable. We work on back-end services using Scala. We also work on a handful of portals that our customers use. These portals are written with Groovy and Grails.

  • I resistance train. Some videos are up on YouTube and I made a 5/3/1 Workout Calculator.
  • I have been known to tweet.

Stand back, I'm a professional

  • Here's my Resume and I have a profile on LinkedIn.
  • Some of my software is at GitHub.
